name: onboard-ai-backend
description: OnboardAI Backend - Lambda Functions and Infrastructure

scripts.deploy:dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation-template.yaml --stack-name onboard-ai-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy:staging: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation-template.yaml --stack-name onboard-ai-staging --parameter-overrides Environment=staging --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation-template.yaml --stack-name onboard-ai-prod --parameter-overrides Environment=production --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
